statements: SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, conversion_count FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_count > 5 ORDER BY conversion_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, conversion_date FROM conversion_rates WHERE ad_id = 3 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, ad_id FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_count > 10 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(conversion_count) AS total_conversions FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_conversions > 50
SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, conversion_count, conversion_date FROM conversion_rates WHERE ad_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY campaign_id, conversion_date
SELECT DISTINCT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_conversions > 5 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY conversion_count ASC
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT campaign_id, date, clicks FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, conversions FROM conversion_rates WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT campaign_id, cost, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE revenue > cost;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, date, conversions FROM conversion_rates WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, cost, revenue FROM campaign_performance WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;

SELECT conversion_rates.date, campaign_performance.revenue, campaign_performance.cost FROM conversion_rates JOIN campaign_performance ON conversion_rates.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING SUM(revenue) > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM ppc_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ppc_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates WHERE campaign_id = 10 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT click_id, campaign_id, click_date FROM ad_clicks WHERE is_converted = TRUE
SELECT * FROM ppc_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 100
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM ppc_campaigns INNER JOIN conversion_rates ON ppc_campaigns.campaign_id = conversion_rates.campaign_id
SELECT campaign_name, click_date, is_converted FROM ppc_campaigns INNER JOIN ad_clicks ON ppc_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_clicks.campaign_id WHERE is_converted = true
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_rate FROM conversion_rates
SELECT * FROM ConversionRates;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_value FROM ConversionRates;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, advertising_platform FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, impression_date, ad_position FROM Impressions WHERE ad_size = 'Large' ORDER BY impression_date;
SELECT * FROM ConversionRates WHERE conversion_value > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversion_value) AS avg_conversion FROM ConversionRates GROUP BY campaign_id;

SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(i.id) AS num_impressions FROM Campaigns c INNER JOIN Impressions i ON c.id = i.campaign_id WHERE i.impression_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY c.campaign_name ORDER BY num_impressions DESC;

SELECT cr.campaign_id, SUM(cr.conversion_value) AS total_conversion_value, COUNT(cl.id) AS num_clicks FROM ConversionRates cr LEFT JOIN Clicks cl ON cr.campaign_id = cl.campaign_id GROUP BY cr.campaign_id HAVING total_conversion_value > 5000;

SELECT i.campaign_id, AVG(i.ad_position) AS avg_ad_position, MAX(cr.conversion_value) AS max_conversion_value FROM Impressions i LEFT JOIN ConversionRates cr ON i.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id GROUP BY i.campaign_id ORDER BY avg_ad_position ASC;
SELECT * FROM ppc_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM ppc_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, bid FROM ad_groups WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT ad_name, ad_copy FROM ads WHERE ad_group_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ppc_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_name, ad_copy, ad_url FROM ads ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_name, ad_copy, ad_url, clicks.click_timestamp FROM ads JOIN clicks ON ads.ad_id = clicks.ad_id WHERE clicks.click_timestamp > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY clicks.click_timestamp DESC;
